citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00pm on June 17,
2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee but when they arrived at the facility a relative informed the
inspector the licensee was not home (and there was no facility representative available, either). Failure to provide access
to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may
result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00pm on June 17, 
2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee but when they arrived at the facility a relative informed the 
inspector the licensee was not home (and there was no facility representative available, either). Failure to provide access 
to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may 
result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
